    • Method Detail

      • register

        public User register(User user)
              throws ServiceException,
                     UserInfoException
        Creates a user in a database if user info is valid.
        A login must be "A-z, 0-9" and without spaces.
        A password must be not empty.
        An email must be "example@adress.com".
        Phone must be like "1234567890".
        All fields must be not empty.
        Specified by:
        register in interface AuthService
        Parameters:
        user - - a user which will be created.
        Returns:
        A user if a user has been created. null if a user hasn't been created.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.
        UserInfoException - - if a user has incorrect info.

      • login

        public User login(java.lang.String login,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws ServiceException,
                  UserInfoException
        Returns user info except a password if user login and password are correct.
        A login must be "A-z, 0-9" and not empty.
        A password must be not empty.
        Specified by:
        login in interface AuthService
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        password - - a user password.
        Returns:
        User info if user login. null if user doesn't login.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.
        UserInfoException - - if a user has incorrect info.
